description: Prompts to support project managers in planning, executing, and delivering complex initiatives on time and within scope.

prompts.title: Project Charter
prompts.prompt: As a Senior Project Manager, draft a project charter for {{project_name}}. Define objectives, scope, success metrics, high-level timeline, budget envelope, and key stakeholders with RACI.

prompts.title: Work Breakdown Structure
prompts.prompt: As a Senior Project Manager, produce a work breakdown structure for {{project_phase}}. Detail deliverables, milestones, dependencies, and estimated effort per work package.

prompts.title: Risk Register
prompts.prompt: As a Senior Project Manager, build a risk register for {{project_name}}. Include probability, impact, mitigation plans, contingency triggers, and owners for top risks.

prompts.title: Stakeholder Engagement Plan
prompts.prompt: As a Senior Project Manager, create a stakeholder engagement plan for {{initiative}}. Segment stakeholders, define engagement cadence, communication formats, and feedback loops.

prompts.title: Integrated Schedule
prompts.prompt: As a Senior Project Manager, craft an integrated schedule for {{project_phase}} across cross-functional teams. Highlight critical path, buffer strategy, and what-if analysis for slippage scenarios.

prompts.title: Resource Allocation
prompts.prompt: As a Senior Project Manager, recommend resource allocation for {{timeframe}}. Balance workload, identify skill gaps, propose staffing adjustments, and flag capacity risks.

prompts.title: Status Report
prompts.prompt: As a Senior Project Manager, prepare an executive-ready status report for {{project_name}}. Summarize progress, blockers, financials, and decisions needed with a red/yellow/green assessment.

prompts.title: Change Request Analysis
prompts.prompt: As a Senior Project Manager, evaluate the change request for {{change_description}}. Assess impact on scope, schedule, budget, quality, and recommend approval criteria.

prompts.title: Vendor Management
prompts.prompt: As a Senior Project Manager, outline a vendor management plan for {{vendor_name}} supporting {{project_component}}. Define SLAs, governance cadence, and performance scorecard.

prompts.title: Project Closure
prompts.prompt: As a Senior Project Manager, create a closure checklist for {{project_name}}. Cover deliverable acceptance, documentation, knowledge transfer, financial reconciliation, and lessons learned.
